mapper.insert: insert into communitycomment(fscno, memberid, fsccontent, regdate, fsno) values(c_seq.nextval, #{memberid}, #{fsccontent},sysdate, #{fsno})
mapper.update: update fscomment set fsccontent = #{fsccontent} where fscno = #{fscno}
mapper.select: select * from fscomment where fsno = #{fsno} order by regdate desc
